mapper.sql: taskid, taskName, type, title, context, sender, sendDept, senderTime,receiver,receiveDept,receiveTime,status
mapper.select: SELECT AA.FLIGHT_NO_IATA FLIGHT_NO_IATA_A, AA.STAND STAND_A, AA.OPERATIONAL_DATE, AA.SIBT, AA.ELDT, AA.ALDT,aa.airline_code_icao, BB.FLIGHT_NO_IATA FLIGHT_NO_IATA_D, BB.SOBT, BB.AOBT, BB.ATOT, CC.STATUS STATUS, CC.STATUS STATE,cc.SENDER,cc.RECEIVER FROM (SELECT TA.FLIGHT_NO_IATA, TA.OPERATIONAL_DATE, TA.A_OR_D, TA.FLIGHT_REPEAT_COUNT, TA.STAND, TA.SIBT, TA.ELDT, TA.ALDT,ta.airline_code_icao, TB.LNK_CARRIER_CODE, TB.LNK_FLIGHT_NO, TB.LNK_FLIGHT_SUFFIX, TB.LNK_FLIGHT_REPEAT_COUNT, TB.LNK_SCHEDULE_DATE FROM DAILY_FLIGHT_MASTER TA LEFT JOIN DAILY_FLIGHT_ADD_DETAILS TB ON TA.FLIGHT_NO_IATA =TB.FLIGHT_NO_IATA AND TA.OPERATIONAL_DATE=TB.OPERATIONAL_DATE AND TA.A_OR_D =TB.A_OR_D LEFT JOIN DAILY_FLIGHT_AIRLINES TC ON TA.FLIGHT_NO_IATA =TC.FLIGHT_NO_IATA AND TA.OPERATIONAL_DATE=TC.OPERATIONAL_DATE AND TA.A_OR_D =TC.A_OR_D LEFT JOIN DAILY_FLIGHT_AIRLINES_MORE TD ON TA.FLIGHT_NO_IATA =TD.FLIGHT_NO_IATA AND TA.OPERATIONAL_DATE =TD.OPERATIONAL_DATE AND TA.A_OR_D =TD.A_OR_D WHERE nvl(TB.CODE_SHARE_STATUS,' ') <>'SF' AND nvl(TB.FLIGHT_CANCEL_CODE,' ') <>'C' AND TB.FLIGHT_CLASS_CODE IN ('L/W','W/Z','C/B') AND TA.A_OR_D ='A' AND to_char(TA.OPERATIONAL_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')=#{params.planDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AA LEFT JOIN (SELECT T1.FLIGHT_NO_IATA, T1.OPERATIONAL_DATE, T1.A_OR_D, T1.FLIGHT_REPEAT_COUNT, T1.ATOT , T1.SOBT, T1.AOBT FROM DAILY_FLIGHT_MASTER T1 LEFT JOIN DAILY_FLIGHT_ADD_DETAILS T2 ON T1.FLIGHT_NO_IATA =T2.FLIGHT_NO_IATA AND T1.OPERATIONAL_DATE=T2.OPERATIONAL_DATE AND T1.A_OR_D =T2.A_OR_D LEFT JOIN DAILY_FLIGHT_AIRLINES T3 ON T1.FLIGHT_NO_IATA =T3.FLIGHT_NO_IATA AND T1.OPERATIONAL_DATE=T3.OPERATIONAL_DATE AND T1.A_OR_D =T3.A_OR_D LEFT JOIN DAILY_FLIGHT_AIRLINES_MORE T4 ON T1.FLIGHT_NO_IATA =T4.FLIGHT_NO_IATA AND T1.OPERATIONAL_DATE =T4.OPERATIONAL_DATE AND T1.A_OR_D =T4.A_OR_D WHERE nvl(T2.CODE_SHARE_STATUS,' ') <>'SF' AND nvl(T2.FLIGHT_CANCEL_CODE,' ') <>'C' AND T2.FLIGHT_CLASS_CODE IN ('L/W','W/Z','C/B') AND T1.A_OR_D ='D' ) BB ON (AA.LNK_CARRIER_CODE || AA.LNK_FLIGHT_NO || COALESCE(AA.LNK_FLIGHT_SUFFIX,''))=BB.FLIGHT_NO_IATA AND AA.LNK_FLIGHT_REPEAT_COUNT =BB.FLIGHT_REPEAT_COUNT AND AA.LNK_SCHEDULE_DATE = BB.OPERATIONAL_DATE left join task_status cc on AA.OPERATIONAL_DATE=cc.OPERATIONAL_DATE and AA.flight_no_iata=cc.flight_no_iata
mapper.insert: insert into task_Status ( title, advise, sender, companyName,stand, send_Time,receiver,A_OR_D,OPERATIONAL_DATE, flight_no_iata,receive_Time,status) values ( #{title,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{stand_A,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{send_Time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{A_OR_D,jdbcType=VARCHAR},to_date(#{OPERATIONAL_DATE,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss'), #{flight_NO_IATA_A,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receive_Time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
